column5: Hello  Just got back from a great day of fly-fishing for salmon,  I managed to get into fish,  There are quite a few around.  Todays condition was good, weather was good overcast not to hot and the rain held out untill mid afternoon.   All fish were released and all taken on spey flies in the deeper pools.  Here are some pics.    A hot colour today black and green spey fly     Broke in the new G LOOMIS 9wt today, good stick for these fish   I will be out again on Friday and if anyone would like to fish on Sat let me know  Dave  P.S  Thats for the info SCOTT
Awesome reel and that rod's a beauty too.
yeah i was out the other day too and picked up a few......good to see your out catching fish again Dave! take care  Hawk

Hey DMASSE, it looks like you got into some nice fish today. I only manage to hook one but it broke off right away. I might be out there tomorrow or Saturday so hope to see you there. It was nice meeting you. Good Luck!    -Fishnpro
ANYTIME BRO!!! GLAD YA GOT INTO SOME!!!!
Is it a female? If so, where are all the eggs?
Nice! Man if my ankle wasn't swelling up again, I would definitely like to go fish some tribs. Haven't in years. Oh well, thanks for the report.

Fishing pro  good to meet you as well.   We should go fishing sometime, you sound  hard core as much as I am.  All fish were females, and all had tons of eggs in them  ALL SKEIN.  Plus I usually dont get eggs from wild fish..   I like to buy hatchery eggs..  Personally I think this weekend is going to be great,  some of the waters I were at yesterday were prime and fish were starting to move around..  Looking forward in going again on Sat  Dave
Oh ya. Can't wait to get my first. The time has come
Dave, nice fish!  That thing would absolutely destroy my 4wt
Great report and pics DMASSE  Well done and thanks for sharing! Leechman
Nice job Dmass Sweet reel its Purrrdy...  Ken
Ken wish you were there.  I was hoping you come today,  we landed tons of fish.  Milty had a blast and we only ended up with 2 broken rods  Later  dave
Dave, good to hear from you, glad you had a good day and I hope all is well!  Maureen
